usefulItems: pastry brush, thermal serving bowl or other large bowl, jug
title: Corned beef with mustard sauce

ingredients.content: 400 - 500 g Kent pumpkin, peeled and cut into pieces (5-6 cm)

preparations.content: Brush Varoma dish with oil and set aside.

Place water, cloves and vinegar into mixing bowl. Place prepared Varoma dish into position and weigh beef into it, ensuring beef fits comfortably and lid closes securely. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>60 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Set Varoma aside. Insert simmering basket into mixing bowl and weigh pumpkin into it. Place Varoma back into position. Weigh peas, corn and sauerkraut into Varoma dish around beef. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Remove Varoma and check if vegetables and meat are cooked to your liking. If needed, secure Varoma lid and cook for a further <b>6-10 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Transfer corned beef and vegetables into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and cover to keep warm. Transfer 100 g of the cooking liquid into a jug and set aside. Discard remaining cooking liquid.

hintsAndTricks: To make your own sauerkraut, please refer to the recipe on Cookidoo.
